attributes.action: Since the eu rules everything that we do, we no longer need a 'local' government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Without our agreement we are now ruled by the eu, this costs us billions each year, so why should we also pay for MPs etc when they cannot do anything without the unelected eu saying yes.  If we didnot also have to pay our government for just rubber stamping the eu, we would save millions.  Otherwise we should have the right to get OUT of the eu

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
